Publication.title: On the Complexity of Some Colorful Problems Parameterized by Treewidth
Publication.abstractText: This research has been supported by the Australian Research Council through the Australian Centre in Bioinformatics. The first author also acknowledges the support provided by a Fel- lowship to the Institute of Advanced Studies, Durham University, and the support of the Informatics Institute at the University of Bergen during an extended visit.

Section.title: 2 Some Coloring Problems That Are Hard for Treewidth
